name: IMDB - Dark grey improved
description:
I took 2 of the other designs ( style 1004 & style 1854) and tweaked a bit more to my liking. So its a clean dark grey design with no odd coloring.
Update: Fixed for IMDB redesign.

Update (11-29-09): Removed yellow buttons on the left.
